mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_person_info (lost_person_type, lost_person_no, lost_person_name, lost_person_sex, lost_person_age, lost_person_height, lost_person_area, lost_person_live, lost_person_character, lost_person_others, lost_person_time, lost_person_registerTime, lost_person_img_id, lost_person_family_name, lost_person_family_phone) VALUES (#{type}, #{no}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{height}, #{area}, #{live}, #{character}, #{others}, #{time}, #{registerTime}, #{img_id}, #{family_name}, #{family_phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE lost_person_info SET lost_person_type = #{type}, lost_person_no = #{no}, lost_person_name = #{name}, lost_person_sex = #{sex}, lost_person_age = #{age}, lost_person_height = #{height}, lost_person_area = #{area}, lost_person_live = #{live}, lost_person_character = #{character}, lost_person_others = #{others}, lost_person_time = #{time}, lost_person_img_id = #{img_id}, lost_person_family_name = #{family_name}, lost_person_family_phone = #{family_phone} WHERE lost_person_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from lost_person_info ORDER BY lost_person_id DESC LIMIT 0,50
